name: Octopia
description:
Octopia is a top-down shooting game, but you can convert other octopuses to fight with you.

0) Windows Version is added

1) Move your octopus: W, A, S, D

2) Zoom in and zoom out: Mouse wheel

3) Shoot: Left mouse button

4) Slow down time: SPACE

5) Pause menu: ESC

6) Key Feature:

A: Each octopus has 5 different relation statuses toward you (supporting, friendly, neutral, hostile, and enemy).

B: Octopus's relation status can be changed when getting close to other octopuses (including the player)

Tools used: Unity3D, Blender, Photoshop
